title: Spirituality and Healing Examined
description: Dr. Christina Puchalski, professor of Medicine at the GW School of Medicine and Health Sciences, addressed nurses, nursing students, clergy and volunteers at the Chambersburg Hospital in Chambersburg, PA. She talked about integrating spirituality and patient care.
sitename: School of Medicine and Health Sciences
cleaned_text: Dr. Christina Puchalski, professor of Medicine at the GW School of Medicine and Health Sciences, addressed nurses, nursing students, clergy and volunteers at the Chambersburg Hospital in Chambersburg, PA. She talked about integrating spirituality and patient care.
